title: Hungary Gross Household Saving Rate
description: Household Saving Rate in Hungary decreased to 15.10 percent in 2021 from 15.62 percent in 2020. Personal Savings in Hungary averaged 12.41 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 17.90 percent in 1995 and a record low of 6.84 percent in 2003. In Hungary, Households Savings correspond to the household income saved during a certain period of time. This page provides - Hungary Households Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
